DescriptionData.Title: Rainbow Streamers (6" x 30')
DescriptionData.Description: Long silk streamers that appear to go on forever as you pull them from your hat, your hand, or almost anyplace!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Long silk streamers that appear to go on forever

DescriptionData.Title: Rainbow Streamers (4" x 15')
DescriptionData.Description: Long silk streamers that appear to go on forever as you pull them from your hat, your hand, or almost anyplace!

DescriptionData.Title: Sad To Happy Face Silk Sets (9 Inch)
DescriptionData.Description: A silk is pulled from a change bag (not included) and shown to audience, but it is frowning instead of smiling. You then put it back into the bag and with a wave of a wand and some magic words, then pull out the silk again - but to your surprise it is still frowning! You suddenly get an idea, and pull out a red pom pom ball and throw both back in the bag. This time when you pull the silk, it shows a cute smiley face with the red nose attached. Of course you then show the bag empty. Measures 9 inches diagonally.

DescriptionData.Title: Mismade USA Flag Set (16" x 13")
DescriptionData.Description: This Flash version of the popular Mismade Flag trick requires no additional props like a change bag. You show your audience a US Flag silk, only the flag is incomplete - it has red and white stripes but no stars. Shake the flag, and it transforms into a complete flag, but the colors are in the wrong places! Shake it again, and the flag is complete and all the right colors. Size is 13.5 inches x 16.5 inches. Fun to do, Fun to watch! A must for all clowns. Great for school programs and holidays.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: With three shakes, transforms from a mis-made flag, to another mis-made flag, to a complete flag

DescriptionData.Title: Middle Diddle Silks (10 Inch)
DescriptionData.Description: In this easy and fun trick, a silk is knotted through the hole in the end red of the board. After a pass behind your back, the silk has jumped to the opposite end, now appearing in the hole in the yellow section. This is repeated until the audience realizes that you are turning the board around behind your back, and the end sections are differently colored on the opposite sides of the board. You appear stunned at the accusation, and pass the board behind your back once again. This time, the silk appears tied through the hole in the middle of the board, proving the silk really does magically jump from hole to hole! A compact flat item with the popular Monkey Bar sucker effect, this comes complete with special mechanical board (making this very easy to do), silk, and full instructions. Measures 10 inches diagonally.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Middle Diddle silk magic trick kit
Includes mechanical board for ease of use and full instructions

DescriptionData.Title: Silks To Flower Tube Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Three brightly colored silks are placed in a mesh tube, so they are clearly visible through the net at all times. The tube is tossed into the air and caught, and when the silks are removed, they have transformed into a feather flower in the same colors. Easy to do, and comes complete with three silks, net tube and feather flower.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Silks to flowers tube magic trick kit
Includes three silks, net tube, and feather flower

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Blendo Silk Sets (6")
DescriptionData.Description: Thumbtip Blendo Silk Set made by Magic by Gosh with high quality silks. Four single silks makgically blend into one silk of four colors! 6 inch in diameter.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Four single silks makgically blend into one silk of four colors!

DescriptionData.Title: Crystal Silk Tube Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Beautiful stage magic that's easy to do. You display three separate silk hands and place them into a clear tube, where they can clearly be seen. After the magic words are pronounced, the silks are removed, now tied together at their ends! No tricky knots to learn or difficult moves to memorize. Just simple, direct and elegant magic. Complete with gimmick, instructions, tube and three silk handkerchiefs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Crystal silk tube magic trick kit
Includes gimmick, instructions, tube, and three silk handkerchiefs

DescriptionData.Title: Duck/Rabbit Production Silks (36 Inch)
DescriptionData.Description: A new and different production silk, with a novel touch of magic. Reach into an empty hat or change bag, telling your audience you're going to produce a rabbit. Instead, you pull out a silk which when opened displays a Duck, instead of a rabbit! Surprised, you fold up the silk, and when you reopen it, the picture of the duck has changed to a rabbit! Produced on super grade silk, approx 21" square.

DescriptionData.Title: Double Changing Silks Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Show a red and a green silk scarf tied together. Pass your hand over them and they change to blue and yellow! Colors may vary. Easy to do! By Magic by Gosh.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Double changing magic silks trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Birthday Cake Silks (18")
DescriptionData.Description: This is one effect that no birthday party entertainer should be without - it's simply a fabulous year 'round routine with some fantastic eye-catching magic. Announce that you are going to bake a cake, and display a handkerchief with a picture of a mixing bowl and spoon. The handkerchief is placed inside a change bag, and when it is shown again, it has a picture of a birthday cake! Now that's some cool magic. But wait -- there's more! You realize that in order for the cake to be official, it needs to say "Happy Birthday" and have decorations! Dropping the handkerchief into the bag again, you mix everything up, and PRESTO -- the handkerchief now shows the cake decorated for a birthday! This is a great set to use with your Change Bag or Dove Pan. You get a complete routine and three beautiful screened silks that are about 18 inches diagonal: Mixing Bowl, Undecorated Cake, and Happy Birthday Cake. Add a mixing spoon as a wand and a few candles and you are all set.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes complete routine and three beautiful screened silks (Mixing Bowl, Undecorated Cake, and Happy Birthday Cake pictures)

DescriptionData.Title: Happy Birthday Dyeing Silk Sets (18 inch)
DescriptionData.Description: Magically change a black and white silk into a fun and colorful silk with a birthday cake, two bunnies and Happy Birthday. Includes two 18 inch silks - one black and white, the other in four beautiful colors.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes two 18" inch silks black and white, and four colored (colors may vary)

DescriptionData.Title: Happy Clown Production Silk (45 inch)
DescriptionData.Description: This brightly colored fun clown handkerchief silk is large and highly visible to your whole audience! Produce it from a change bag or other magic item (not included) for a stunning effect. Measures 45 in x 45 in.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great for use with change bags or other magic items (not included)

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Blendo Silk Sets (18")
DescriptionData.Description: Thumbtip Blendo Silk Set made by Magic by Gosh with high quality silks. Four single silks makgically blend into one silk of four colors! 6 inch in diameter.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: High-quality thumb tip Blendo silk set
Four single-colored silks magically blend into one multi-colored silk

DescriptionData.Title: Sketch-O-Magic Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Your audience or helper creates their own picture from a sketch pad containing several dozen segments of artwork. When your prediction is pulled from an envelope, you reveal an image that shows you correctly guessed which combination of artwork would be chosen!

DescriptionData.Title: Rudy Reindeer Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Giant foam molars work great with our Giant Toothbrushes (see below). Don't forget to brush!

DescriptionData.Title: Obedient Rope Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: An ordinary length of rope is displayed while you explain that you've been learning hypnotism (but you have to start on ropes, not people). With the proper hypnotic technique, you are able to make the rope stand straight up, and then relax on your command. You begin with the rope wrapped around your hand, and even tie it in a knot to illustrate that it is an ordinary length of rope. Wonderful for clowns and magicians who work with children. Two routines included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Rope becomes stiff or flexible on command

DescriptionData.Title: Traffic Signal Rope Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A simple but effective routine of the Monkey Bar variety, by Ian Adair, performed with a length of rope, (which you can carry in your pocket, yet use for a large audience), and which requires no skill other than a suitable presentation. In effect the magician displays a length of rope in three different colors; red, yellow and green. The red section is at the top, the green at the bottom and yellow at the middle. He places the rope behind his back and with a few magic words, the red magically travels to the bottom - or so it seems. This is repeated a few times until the children point out how its done. But watch their faces when, for a finale, the red section is found to have traveled to the middle. Totally mechanical and can be performed on stage or close up. Supplied complete with instructions and the colored rope, four and a half feet long. Great for children's shows and adults alike - the looks on the children's faces are priceless!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Traffic signal magic rope trick kit
Includes 4 foot long rope and instructions
Routine of the monkey bar variety by Ian Adair

DescriptionData.Title: Tide in the Middle Magic Rope Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A rope is placed in a change bag. You tell the audience that you are going to make the rope become tied in the middle. Then when you remove the rope from the bag, there is a detergent box in the middle of it. Then the magic happens when you show the bag empty. Wonderful for a change bag or tote bag routine. If you are on a budget you can get a good laugh without doing any magic with a regular paper bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Tide in the middle magic rope trick kit
Wonderful for a change bag routine

DescriptionData.Title: Magician's Rope - 50 Foot Hank
DescriptionData.Description: This is a hank of thick cored cotton rope, about 10 mm (3/8 inch) in diameter, with greater visibility for a large audience. Use it for any and all rope effects - Cut and Restored ropes, Knotting Effects, Penetrations, etc. It has a solid hefty feel, and the increased diameter makes it easy to gimmick with rope gimmicks or magnets. Supplied in hanks of 25' white. No instructions included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Thick cored cotton (10 mm or 3/8 inch in diameter)
Great visibility for a large audience for a variety of routines
Two hanks of 25 feet white in color

DescriptionData.Title: Multiplying Bunny Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Rabbits, Rabbits, Rabbits Pro (Large Bunnies=3") Two large sponge bunnies are shown to a volunteer, who selects one of them. The chosen bunny is placed in the volunteer's hand, the other into the magician's pocket. When the volunteer opens his hand, out pops 2 bunnies! The two rabbits are then placed in the volunteer's hand, and when the hand opens it reveals the two large bunnies with a bunch of baby bunnies.

DescriptionData.Title: Popcorn Dye Magic Box
DescriptionData.Description: This great utility item has so many uses. A cardboard popcorn box is shown empty. Suddenly, silks are magically produced from it! It can also be used to vanish silks or make them change color. Other small items can also be used in the box. The perfect vanish for (20th Century Silks).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magic item disappearing and re-appearing popcorn box

DescriptionData.Title: White Polka Dot Shower Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A black silk handkerchief printed with dozens of White polka dots is shown. The silk is passed through your hand and all the dots have vanished. But that's not all, open the closed hand that you passed the silk through and you toss up a handful of white polka dots!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: White polka dot shower magic trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Phlipitt! Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A heavy metal ring and a long cord. You can easily roll the ring down the cord, attaching the two. Trying to teach your subject to do the same, however, begins the fun!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Phlipitt! magic ring and cord trick

DescriptionData.Title: Itty Bitty Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Itty Bitty is our smallest traditional change bag. Just like our larger change bags, this wood handled velvet pouched bag is large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouthcoil, or a host of other small items you can find on our (Pocket Magic) page. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouth coil, or other small items

DescriptionData.Title: Instant Popsicle Triples Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description:
You show your audience a popsicle box, and excitedly open it up to have your snack. To your dismay, all that falls out is the popsicle stick! It's a good thing you know magic, though. Pour a little colored liquid into the box, place the stick in the box, turn it over and remove your completed popsicle! If you wish, you can replace the popsicle in the box, remove the stick and pour out the liquid once again.
In the Popsicle Triples, you have three boxes with three different flavors of popsicle, and the longer routine (included) lets you involve members of your audience as assistants. An offbeat item for kid show performers - complete with the special "Foo Can Principle" plastic popsicles, sticks, attractive colored boxes and instructions for single or multiple popsicles. Perform the complete routine with the three different-colored popsicles supplied, or the basic effect as described above.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes special "Foo Can Principle" plastic Popsicles, sticks, attractive colored boxes, and instructions for single or multiple Popsicle routines

DescriptionData.Title: Incrediball Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A small sponge ball is transformed into a large sponge ball. No switch, easy to do.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Incrediball size changing ball magic trick kit
Small sponge ball appears to transform into a larger ball

DescriptionData.Title: Hot Flip Flop Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Display a colorful accordion pleated set of panels, each with a different color "fan" attached. An audience member selects a color and on command, the panels flip over, changing all the fans to that color! The Flip Flop action makes this a very novel visual display, as the panels tumble down, and all the fans change to the selected color. Combines the visual appeal of the Flip Flop with the popular Hot Rod theme, to make for a very simple, yet novel platform or stage magic effect, which can be presented for a much larger audience. Ready to use, instructions included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Hot flip flop color changing magic trick kit
Good for platform and stage acts

DescriptionData.Title: Stage-Size Hippity Hop Rabbits Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: The performer shows 2 cut out rabbits, one white and one black. They are covered, moved around and then uncovered, revealing that the rabbits have switched places! This is repeated a number of times, and the audience will believe that both rabbits are white on one side and black on the other. Finally, you turn the rabbits around to show that the backs are actually red and green! Stage size Rabbits are about 10.5 inches tall.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Stage rabbits are about 10.5 inches tall

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Hippity Hop Rabbits Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: The performer shows 2 cut out rabbits, one white and one black. They are covered, moved around and then uncovered, revealing that the rabbits have switched places! This is repeated a number of times, and the audience will believe that both rabbits are white on one side and black on the other. Finally, you turn the rabbits around to show that the backs are actually red and green! Mini Rabbits are about 5 inches tall.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Mini rabbits are about 5 inches tall

DescriptionData.Title: Growing Ball Outdone Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A 2 inch red foam ball and a 2 inch black ball are pushed into a fist, turning into a 4 inch red ball and 7 small black balls!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes a red and black 2 inch foam ball, a 4 inch red ball, 7 small black balls, and instructions

DescriptionData.Title: Production Garland Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This colorful paper streamer folds up so small that you can easily palm it in your hand, but it stretches out to nearly twenty feet of colorful streamers! Buy lots of them, and produce them from...well...most anything!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Produces nearly 20 feet of colorful streamers from a compact, palm-sized roll

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Hat Paper Tears Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Tears and restores to a pointed clown hat in multi-colored paper with a pom-pom on the end of it. Perfect for clowning around. Pack of 10.

DescriptionData.Title: Bonnet Paper Tears Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Restores into a cute sun bonnet style hat. In assorted bright colors. Pack of 12.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Bonnet paper hat restoration magic trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Dove Pans
DescriptionData.Description: This wonderful production prop lets you produce anything - from live animals to real or foam cakes or other prizes! Show the pan empty, then cover the pan, say some magic words and remove the cover to reveal the item of your choice! Dove Pan is 7 inches in diameter.

DescriptionData.Title: Cupcake Pans
DescriptionData.Description: This is a pocket-sized photo of your sweetie makes a great finale to "My Clown Story" (see below).

DescriptionData.Title: Obedient Ball Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A brightly colored ball on a string that you hold up in front of your audience, allowing the ball to fall down along the string until you say "STOP". Movement of the ball down the string can be started and stopped on your command. A more economical version of the Jumbo Cubio Trick (See below trick.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: A brightly colored ball on a string that starts and stops on command

DescriptionData.Title: Newton's Nightmare Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A brilliant synthesis of sorcery and science, Newton's Nightmare must be seen to be believed! From the mind of William J. Schmeelk comes this gravity-defying miracle. A brass weight is dropped through an aluminum tube. It rockets through, falling into the spectator's hand. So far, so good. But, at the magician's command, the weight drops through the tube in slow motion - like an astronaut bounding across the moon! The weight can be clearly seen floating through the tube! Furthermore, the brass weight can be seen floating through the tube - even while the trick is in the package, making this a virtually self-performing miracle! Newton's Nightmare is a delight to perform, and easy enough for any aspiring sorcerer - or scientist - to master.

DescriptionData.Title: Needle Thru Balloon Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Classic trick comes with extra large needle, balloons and instructions. Extra clear balloons are also available. Store your Needle in the self lubricating storage wand.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Needle through the balloon magic trick kit
Includes extra needle, balloons, and instructions

DescriptionData.Title: Storage Wand for Needle Thru Balloon Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Store your Needle in this self lubricating storage wand.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Storage wand for needle though the balloon magic trick

DescriptionData.Title: Napkin Rose Refills - Red/Green (50/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: The greatest give-away since the balloon animal! Red/Green Napkin Rose refills, 50/pack.

DescriptionData.Title: Nails Thru Balloon Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Here's a birthday cake you won't mind getting on your face. With frosting, candles, and playful writing on the cake you might actually try to blow out these flames. With high quality plastic frames and metal hinges these glasses will last for many birthdays to come. Fun to use with any of our Birthday Hats (see below) or on their own! Plastic hinges, UV 400 protection, fits adults and kids 12 and up. By Elope.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Nails though balloons magic illusion trick kit
Includes 3 inch diameter x 4.5 inch long aluminum tube, 2 nails, and starter balloons

DescriptionData.Title: Mouth Coils - Money (by Cresey)
DescriptionData.Description: These money streamers are 25 feet of paper money by David Cresey that you can pull from your mouth or pocket! Pack of 12.

DescriptionData.Title: Mouth Coils - Rainbow (by Cresey)
DescriptionData.Description: Brightly colored 25 foot rainbow streamers by David Cresey. Great for pulling a seemingly endless stream of paper from your mouth or pocket! Each package contains 12 non-reusable coils.

DescriptionData.Title: Egg Nest Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This colorful and eye-catching trick makes a great impact - everyone likes to the chance to win something for free! Show your audience five colorful plastic Easter eggs, and slip a gold coin, dollar bill or a ring into the one of the eggs (without showing which color egg has the item). Four people are invited to reach into the bag without looking and remove an egg, and you take the last egg. Of course the egg left for you is the one with the the valuables! Also a great way to give something special to the birthday child. Directions and ideas included. Very easy to do. Need some (Silly Rings)?

DescriptionData.Title: Leprechaun Puzzle Magic Trick (9.5")
DescriptionData.Description: In this amazing puzzle, you show your audience a drawing of 15 leprechauns that has been cut into three pieces. Simply swap the two top pieces, and a leprechaun vanishes! But where does he go? Super easy to do, packs flat! Pocket Puzzle is 9.5 x 5 inches.

DescriptionData.Title: Linking Rings Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: One of the most popular tricks in magic, the linking rings are adaptable to any style - comedic to dramatic. These six gleaming rings are first shown to be solid and separate, and then link and unlink in a most mysterious manner. Use it as an opener with just three rings, or use five, six or the full set of eight rings - you can even call on a helper to examine the rings at various stages of the routine. Full set of eight, stainless steel rings with a basic routine. For additional tips and routines, check out the video 25 Tricks With Linking Rings (see below).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes 8 rings and a routine guide

DescriptionData.Title: Little Pea Can Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Pour from a tiny can into someone's hand a pea, a corn kernel and a bean. Tell him to think of one and put all three back into the can. Place a cork into the can and proceed to magically guess which was chosen. Enjoy the surprise as you poor out a few drops of water, exclaiming "You were thinking of the Pea!"
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Little pea can magic trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Lota Bowl Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Show this attractive aluminum bowl as empty to your audience. On your command the bowl fills with water. The bowl is emptied, only to fill again on its own minutes later. This is repeated several times through your performance and the audience will wonder where the water comes from. Pours about 13 times.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Refills with water about 13 times per use

DescriptionData.Title: Lollipops Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Reach into a paper bag and pull out a red lollipop. Show the bag empty, reach in and pull out a green lollipop. Repeat for yellow and orange.

DescriptionData.Title: Magic Palette Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Appears to be a regular artist's palette, with brightly colored blobs of paint. Just wave the palette and the colors vanish, leaving "empty" black spots in their place. The effect will also work in reverse. This terrific prop can be used any of the Magic Coloring Books or with many other coloring effects to enhance the routine.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Palette magically changes from empty to full of paint
Great for use with magic coloring book acts

DescriptionData.Title: Magical Block Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Good for all ages. Place a penny on the back of a subject's hand and set the block on top of it. When you remove the block, the penny has turned into a dime!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magical penny to dime transforming black trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Tote Smiley Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Smiley Switch Bag by Sam Tee. These flat, colorful change bags are perfect for many silk changes (available on the (silks page)) or vanishes. Smiley Tote is approx. 9.5" tall x 8" wide;
